abstract: PPL is to sell interests in some of its power stations to the LS Power subsidiary LS Power Equity Advisors for about $381 million, the company announced Thursday.
snippet: PPL is to sell interests in some of its power stations to the LS Power subsidiary LS Power Equity Advisors for about $381 million, the company announced Thursday.
lead_paragraph: PPL Corporation, the electricity supplier, is set to sell interests in some of its power stations to the LS Power subsidiary LS Power Equity Advisors for about $381 million, the company announced Thursday.

headline.main: PPL to Sell Plant Interests to LS Power
